description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d9icn","text":"Protocol to perform 2D ex vivo segmentation assay (Lauschke et al. 2013).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d72mv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df8dp","text":"Extract mouse embryos and collect tails in dissection medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g59v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6tf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de31a","text":"Wash the dried wells with ~200μL culture medium per well. Apply fresh culture medium (160uL ~ 300μL per well) and equilibrate in 37°C 5% CO2 until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7stb1","text":"Cut the tail bud using a scalpel in dissection medium. Be careful not to flick the tail buds as this damages the tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16ugc","text":"Dilute fibronectin (Sigma, Cat.No: F1141) with PBS to 50ug/mL (20 fold dilution).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sas2","text":"Fill each well of 8-well plate (NuncTMLab-TekTMII Chambered Coverglass, Cat.No: 155409PK) with ~160μl of fibronectin solution and incubate for 1 hour in 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s9ve","text":"Remove all fibronectin solution from the well(s) and dry for 1 hour at room temperature (~25°C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4dr","text":"Add   to the remaining   mix in step 2.1. This mix is used as dissection medium. It can be kept at the bench until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5h1kn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"510","error":false,"guid":"A968AE1F7AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"HEPES","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"A968AEAF7AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cm8s7","text":"Separate   from the mix in step 2.1 and filter through a 0.22μm filter (Millex-GV, Cat.No: SLGV033RS) into a fresh 15 mL falcon tube. Add   to achieve  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":138,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44vmc","text":"100U/mL. This mix is used as culture medium. Equilibrate in 37°C 5% CO2 until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"B15B763E7AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"B15B75B87AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Penicillin/Streptomycin (Gibco, Cat.No: 15140-122)","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73k9j","text":"Mix the following ingredients in a 50 mL falcon tube:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4grr8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kdr8","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a31m8","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dfcnu","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"drk4t","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c7gq4","text":"Vortex well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.4","error":false,"guid":"B90000DA7AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"BSA","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"B900015E7AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"glutamine","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35.2","error":false,"guid":"B90001C37AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"45% glucose","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"B90000387AAF11EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"DMEM-F12","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4kck","text":"Wash the tail buds once in a dish containing culture medium. Quickly move the tail buds to the fibronectin coated wells. Align the tissue orientation using forceps to place the cut side downward.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cg10u","text":"Incubate in 37°C 5% CO2 for 1hr to let the tissue attach.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hoer","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jd8u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hb7r","text":"Place the well into the metal box to fit into the microscope. Add a strip of wet paper towel inside the metal box to prevent drying. Carefully move the box into the microscope, as tissue can detach quite easily.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: mPSM protocol
